ClassDesc: Represents a network route. This is used both to describe static network configuration and live network configuration information. A route contains three pieces of information: a destination @B_android#net#IpPrefix_E@ specifying the network destinations covered by this route. If this is null it indicates a default route of the address family (IPv4 or IPv6) implied by the gateway IP address. a gateway @B_java#net#InetAddress_E@ indicating the next hop to use. If this is null it indicates a directly-connected route. an interface (which may be unspecified). Either the destination or the gateway may be null, but not both. If the destination and gateway are both specified, they must be of the same address family (IPv4 or IPv6).
